About me

background

Hello. My name is Alexey Zadorozhny. I live in the outback called Stary Oskol. This is in the Belgorod region. I'm a junior frontend developer.

I began my journey in the distant 2015. But there were difficulties with my personal life and I abandoned it. Now 2018, I got a job as a web developer. I work with wordpress, 1C-bitrix.

In my private time I improve my skill. I study a lot of technologies. And here I will lay out all my achievements in technology promotion. The code can be viewed at github.com
